TestInformation.Title: Timed Mesa Compilation
TestInformation.Description: This test profile times how long it takes to compile Mesa with Meson/Ninja. For minimizing build dependencies and avoid versioning conflicts, test this is just the core Mesa build without LLVM or the extra Gallium3D/Mesa drivers enabled.
TestInformation.SubTitle: Time To Compile

TestProfile.SystemDependencies: xcb/randr.h, X11/Xproto.h, GL/glxproto.h, X11/extensions/Xext.h, X11/extensions/Xrandr.h, X11/Xutil.h, xcb/xfixes.h
